title: Seahawks-Eagles MNF Recap: Carson Wentz continues to implode as Philadelphia left searching for answers (Football 12/1)
description:
It's the trainwreck you can't quite look away from, but the NFC East submitted another stinker on Monday night as the Eagles fell to the Seahawks 23-17. Naturally, Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech focus on the losing team, critiquing Carson Wentz, Doug Pederson and pretty much all of Philadelphia for their 2020 failures. Injuries have the Eagles depleted, but how much does that matter? On the flip side, Seattle's defense is playing better and DK Metcalf is playing like the best wide receiver in football, avenging being passed over by Philly and a ton of other teams. Join us for this MNF recap episode!
'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
